description.hltext_display: Tessera chip package patent upheld
description.author: Nick Farrell
description.content:
The chip industry is worried about what will happen next after a US appeal court upheld a patent on the packaging of computer chips.
The court gave the thumbs up to Tessera Technologies and a affirmed a US International Trade Commission decision from early 2009.
That ruling said that Qualcomm , Spansion, STMicroelectronics , Freescale and ATI violated Tessera's patents related to how certain chips were packaged.
At the heart of the ruling was technology that allows a semiconductor manufacturer to shrink the size of the package that contains and protects a chip from damage.
AMD , Qualcomm and Spansion said they don't see the decision having an impact on their businesses. Qualcomm said that the patents are expired, as are the ITC's limited exclusion and cease and desist orders.
However it might be that Tessera is now going to pursue a district court action for back damages that may be relevant to the expired patents. That is assuming that none of the chip companies appeal.
When Tessera filed the complaint in April 2007. Motorola was included in the original suit, but the handset maker signed a licensing agreement last year to settle the litigation.
The company offered similar licensing agreements to all the defendants, and Tessera's told the Wall Street Journal Â that those offers still stand. Although the specific patents addressed in the complaint expired this year, the agreements would include an initial payment and then ongoing royalty payments with respect to the patents Tessera holds that have not yet expired.

description.content: When you necessitate funds to congregate your petty requirements and have no adequate source for such monetary hurdle, then, at such circumstance, you can have the option of pounds till payday. This amount has to be returned together with the interest within the time span of 1 to 30 days.In order to avail this type of an advance with no pester, you only need to fill up the small request form giving in your pertinent information. The instant this information is scrutinized, the lenders will then carry out the process and will deposit the amounts into the checking account of the recipient within not less than 24 hours. The main characteristic involved in payday adv loans is that you can get hold of this finance albeit of your poor credit profile. At the same time, you can yet go for this type of scheme although of your various credit tags like missed payments, arrears, defaults and so forth.Pounds till payday are given to you only if you meet the basic eligibility conditions. The conditions entail that you should be a resident of UK, you must be more than the age of 18 years, you must hold a valid account in the bank and last but not the least, you should also have a fixed job with a regular source of salary. Since these finances are of the miniature personality, the borrowers are charged with a high interest rate. In contrast to this, such individuals can yet go for this scheme by taking an alternative help from the internet mode wherein they can get various deals that will suit their economic condition.

description.hltext_display: Zions Bancorporation Rises 2.08% on Heavy Volume: Watch For Potential Pullback (ZION)
description.content:
Zions Bancorporation (NASDAQ:ZION) traded in a range yesterday that spanned from a low of $22.55 to a high of $23.05. Yesterday, the shares gained 2.08%, which took the trading range above the 3-day high of $22.92 on volume of 3.2 million shares. Often times after large one-day gains, short term traders will seek to take profits and, as such, investors should be cautious.
Shares of Zions Bancorporation are currently trading above their 50-day moving average (MA) of $21.32 and above their 200-day MA of $22.42. Look for the MA to provide support for a short-term pullback in the shares.
SmarTrend currently has shares of Zions Bancorporation in an Uptrend and issued the Uptrend alert on December 07, 2010 at $21.52. The stock has risen 4.8% since the Uptrend alert was issued.
SmarTrend expects the share price to pullback toward the $22.92 support level. Afterwards, we expect it to move upward with its peers in the SmarTrend Regional Banks- Pacific industry.
Keywords: zions bancorporation trading range stock news

The study gives prediction on development tendency of European tire industry â¦ . The study provides Forecast on the tire industry development in the Americas and profiles major companies engaged in the tire business... . The study provides data on operations of the top 50 enterprises of global tire industry, presents information on production capability and development trend of the top 50 enterprises of global tire industry. The report informs of the investment of major global tire enterprises in China... . The report provides information on development environment, productivity changes, competition and development of China's caustic soda industry. The study presents major enterprises and their operations, offers information on import and export and influence of the international financial crisis on the industry... . The report provides forecast on investment opportunities and development in China's blood products industry. The research presents an analysis on market demand, major enterprises, policies of China's blood products industry... . The research analyses current situation of China's animal vaccine market and technology. The study presents major enterprises of the industry and their operations, prospects for the development, informs of China's import and export situation...

description.hltext_display: Falls City Beavers win State Championship
description.content:
Falls City senior running back Colin Dziuk leaps onto his coach as the Beavers win their first-ever state championship Dec. 17. Falls City knocked off the Windthorst Trojans 32-7 on a cold, windy night in Mansfield.
Wilson County News
December 21, 2010
MANSFIELD -- After a convincing 32-7 win over the Windthorst Trojans on a bitterly cold night in Mansfield, the Falls City Beavers can now call themselves State Champions. The Beaver football team put together a great playoff run that ended in North Texas Dec. 17 with a victory in the Class 1A Division II title game. . . .
The full article is available to Wilson County News subscribers only (if you receive the paper in the mail or if you have purchased an E-subscription). Subscribe today or purchase this issue (December 22, 2010) for $3.00. (If you are already a subscriber, simply login using the boxes to the left.)

description.hltext_display: Cellphone 'first' for Nissan Leaf
description.content:
Future owners of a Nissan Leaf will be able to talk to their car from their office, house... even their bedroom.
As long as a cellphone or computer is to hand then the car â even if all its systems are turned off â will be able to receive instructions to turn on various functions, including the aircon, or return data about its batteryâs state of charge.
It will also report how many kilometresâ range remains in the electric tank.
Nissan believes it is the first time such connectivity has been available in a standard electric car. Which perhaps helped the Nissan Leaf to win the accolade âEuropean Car of the Year 2011â.
'DEDICATED TELEMATICS'
Telenor Connexion has the contract to be European connectivity supplier for Nissan Leafâs Carwings intelligent transport (IT) system that allows connection between the battery carâs sophisticated transmitting unit and its Nissan Carwings data centre.
Pierre Loing, vice-president of product strategy and planning at Nissan International and head of the companyâs European zero-emissions business unit, explained:
âTelenor Connexionâs dedicated telematics solution connects Nissan Leafâs computer to the Nissan Carwings data centre in a private network environment, so allowing Nissan to deliver a secure and stable product to customers.â
The Nissan Leaf, its make claims, is the world's first mass-production, 100% electric, zero-emissions car. It will be in showrooms in Europe early in 2011.

description.hltext_display: Ø±ÙØ§Ø¯ Ø§ÙØ£Ø¹Ù Ø§Ù Ø§ÙØ´Ø¨Ø§Ø¨ ÙÙØ¯Ù ÙÙ ØªØ¬Ø§Ø±Ø¨ÙÙ Ø¨Ø¬Ø§Ù Ø¹Ø© Ø§ÙÙ ÙÙ Ø³Ø¹ÙØ¯
Low Interest Personal Loans â Get Credit in the Secured and unsecured form
description.content:
Edit Article | Posted: Dec 22, 2010 |Comments: 0 |
Share
Just got your this months cheque but was not sufficient to fulfill all your needs and expenses? Are you in need of urgent cash? Need of cash urgently in satisfying your expenses? Waiting for the some type of financial assistance where you don't have to keep any collateral against the advances. You get financial assistance by applying for these finances for fulfilling your needs.
Low interest Personal loans are offered to you in secured as well as unsecured form. In secured form the borrower needs to offer some asset as a collateral security against the advance. The amount offered in secured forms ranges from Â£500-Â£100000. The period for repayment of the secured loans is of 1-25 years. Here the borrower gets the suitable amount in the suitable time. The unsecured form of loans is provided to you without any collateral security against the advance.
The advances available in unsecured form of loans range from Â£1000-25000. The repayment period for the unsecured loans is from 1-10 years. In comparison of the secured finances, these funds are limited and are entitled to a high sum of interest that makes the loan amount high to repay.
The applicant can use these funds for fulfilling his various needs. The funds can be used for the purchasing of the house, purchase of vehicles, going for a holiday, repayment of education fees and all your daily needs. As these loans are offered to you without any credit check for your financial status these loans carry a high rate of interest. Incase the borrower is unable to repay the amount on time the borrow has to pay a fine of penalty as a late repayment fees.
In order to get this loan a person has to be a UK civilian and must be above 18 years of age. The person should be a salaried person with an active bank account operated for 3 months.

description.hltext_display: NCKU Center for Teaching and Learning Development Inaugurated
description.content:
TAINAN, Taiwan To elevate teaching quality and student learning efficiency and achieve academic excellence, the Center for Teaching and Learning Development (CTLD) of National Cheng Kung University (NCKU), Tainan, Taiwan, is inaugurated on December 22nd in 3rd floor, Yun-Ping Building, Kuang-Fu Campus.
âThe most important function of a university is education, cultivating talents, and then research and social service. It is a universityâs mission to educate youth of the next generation. Education should include two aspects, teaching and learning. However, we mainly focus on the teaching of professors, neglecting the learning of students, which is allowing students to absorb as much knowledge as they can,â said President Michael Ming-Chiao Lai of National Cheng Kung University in his opening remark.
President Lai also mentioned, âNational Cheng Kung University had established Center for Faculty Development which focused solely on the cultivation of teachers. Thus, I believe the newly inaugurated Center for Teaching and Learning Development must embody both aspects of teaching, developing teaching methods, and learning, discovering questions, raising questions and finding solutions. I believe this is the essence of education and the development direction of the future education of National Cheng Kung University.â
NCKU Senior Executive Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung revealed, âI am pleased to see that Vice-President for Academic Affairs Tang has established the Center for Teaching and Learning Development. As I have often said, outstanding talents cannot be cultivated without excellent education, and universities cannot transform into top universities without outstanding talents.â Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung also explained, âAs graduates return to their alma mater, they do not recall how wonderful a professorâs research is and they only remember how strict the teaching of a professor is. Studentsâ parents also do not consider how renowned a professor is in the research field and they only care about how well their children can learn from the school. Therefore, a university, especially a top university, needs to take both teaching and learning into account.â Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung stated, âIn Taiwan, teachers often teach what they like and students often learn what they want. This is incorrect. As teachers devote themselves into teaching, they must observe the learning efficiency of the students from a different perspective. I hope the Center for Teaching and Development Learning can spread the concept for the teachers to realize the importance of education.â
NCKU Vice-President for Academic Affairs Ming-Jer Tang said, âAfter four years of efforts, Center for Teaching and Learning Development finally inaugurated today. For the past years, under the goal set by President Lai, the Office for Academic Affairs has devoted itself to humanistic and innovative education and cross-disciplinary learning. We are excited that the Center for Teaching and Learning Development, established to truly integrate all the resources at NCKU and to promote NCKU to a top university, is finally inaugurated.â Vice-President for Academic Affairs Tang also said, âWe have visited research and teaching universities in The United States years ago, realizing that their centers for teaching and learning development have abundant resources, and we have also visited National Taiwan University and Chung Yuan Christian University, discovering that the former lacks integration and the latter lacks manpower. With the advantages of integrated resources and unified manpower as our foundation, I believe National Cheng Kung University can become an internationally top university in the future.â
The newly inaugurated NCKU Center for Teaching and Learning Development is located on the 3rd floor of Yun-Ping Building, Kuang-Fu Campus, and NCKU President Michael Ming-Chiao Lai, Senior Executive Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung, Vice-President for Academic Affairs Ming-Jer Tang, Director of Center for Teaching and Learning Development J. J. Wang, Director of Center for General Education Wei-Yung Wang, Secretary General Woei-Shyan Lee, other directors, deans and dozens of personnel have attended the inauguration ceremony.
The NCKU Center for Faculty Development, established in 2006, aims to strengthen the professional teaching ability of teachers and teaching assistants; however, to achieve academic excellence and innovation and elevate teaching quality and student learning efficiency, the Center for Teaching and Learning Development (CTLD) is established.

description.hltext_display: Greens support heritage listing to protect the Kimberley from industrialisation - Brown
description.author: marionrae
description.content:
Greens Leader Bob Brown today welcomed the Australian Heritage Council's recommendation that James Price Point, the proposed site of Woodside's gas factory, be included in a national heritage listing for the West Kimberley.
"Environment Minister Tony Burke has already postponed his decision on the national heritage listing for the West Kimberley until mid-2011, and the council's recommendation should now help him to list the area as one of national heritage significance," Senator Brown said.
"The Australian Heritage Council's recommendation highlights the need for the minister for the environment to take this step to try to avert the massive industrial development that threatens the area."
"There is a real danger that a gas-processing factory here will be the toehold to wreck the region's special qualities."
"Coal, bauxite and uranium mining threaten the West Kimberley."
"This beautiful place, with its ancient Indigenous heritage, is also a living ecological treasure and should not be destroyed," Senator Brown said.
In a Freedom of Information release published on the website of the Department of Sustainability, Environment, Water, Population and Communities today:
The area recommended for listing includes dinosaur trackways in the Dampier Peninsular, including James Price Point the proposed site of a natural gas hub.
http://www.environment.gov.au/foi/govt-brief.html
Media contact: Marion Rae 0438 376 082
Â

description.hltext_display: "Yaman: Â«Avec Madonna, c'Ã©tait plus relaxÂ»"
description.content:
Le suspense est Ã son comble. Ãtes-vous prÃªt? Lire la suite l'article
Photos/VidÃ©os liÃ©es "Yaman: Â«Avec Madonna, c'Ã©tait plus relaxÂ»" Agrandir la photo Plus d'articles sur : Discussion: Oui, et je suis trÃ¨s stressÃ©, mais j'espÃ¨re le gÃ©rer. J'ai beaucoup travaillÃ© et pris en compte les critiques de Sophie Edelstein, qui ont Ã©tÃ© trÃ¨s constructives, notamment sur mon costume. Je veux offrir au public un dÃ©cor et une prestation fastueuses. Je compte bien emmener les spectateurs dans ma bulle. J'ai hÃ¢te d'y Ãªtre.
Parlez-nous de votre danse.
C'est un mÃ©lange de mouvements de break alliÃ© Ã une maÃ®trise corporelle trÃ¨s prÃ©cise. Au dÃ©part, je ne savais pas si ma gestuelle parlerait aux gens, car la culture du hip-hop n'est pas trÃ¨s dÃ©veloppÃ©e en France. C'est vrai que Ã§a m'a rendu assez anxieux, finalement Ã§a a l'air de plaire.
Vous avez fait la tournÃ©e mondiale avec Madonna. Est-ce que concourir Ã Â«La France a un incroyable talentÂ» vous semble Ãªtre un jeu d'enfant?
Ce sont deux choses diffÃ©rentes. Avec Madonna j'Ã©tais un performeur et que Ã§a plaise ou non les gens venaient voir Madonna. Avec elle, c'Ã©tait plus relax sur scÃ¨ne. Alors que, dans l'Ã©mission, je suis seul, je prÃ©sente mon univers, ma danse, ma chorÃ©graphie. La dÃ©marche pour moi est plus pÃ©rilleuse, je n'ai que deux minutes pour sÃ©duire le public et je ne dois pas dÃ©cevoir.
On sait que vous avez collaborÃ© avec Kamel Ouali pour la Star Ac' et Le Roi-Soleil . Vous a-t-il soutenu?
Avant tout, Kamel est un ami. AprÃ¨s la demi-finale, il m'a envoyÃ© un SMS pour me fÃ©liciter et me dire qu'il Ã©tait fier de moi, ce qui est trÃ¨s stimulant.
CÃ´tÃ© coulisses, comment est l'ambiance entre les candidats?
C'est la grande famille. Tout le monde se soutient, chacun se sent un peu chez lui, ce qui facilite le bon dÃ©roulement des choses. Je n'ai absolument pas l'impression d'Ãªtre dans une compÃ©tition.
Que regardez-vous Ã la tÃ©lÃ©vision?
J'adore la sÃ©rie Heroes , j'aurais bien aimÃ© Ãªtre l'un des leurs et avoir des pouvoirs surnaturels! Et je regarde La France a un incroyable talent quand Ã§a repasse pour voir les talents du moment.

description.hltext_display: New In-demand Market Research Reports by CRI Published by MarketPublishers.com
description.content:
LONDON, Dec. 22, 2010 /PRNewswire/ -- Market Publishers Ltd informs that new in-demand are available in its catalogue. . The report makes a prediction on development tendency of the tire industry in the Asia-Pacific region in 2011 to 2015. The research analyses consumption and production of the tire industry in the Asia-Pacific region and provides prediction on development of the tire industry... . The report analyses major European tire enterprises and their operations, provides information on production and consumption on Europe tire industry. The study gives prediction on development tendency of European tire industry â¦ . The report dwells on the production of the tire industry in the Americas, analyses operations of the tire industry in major countries in the Americas. The study provides Forecast on the tire industry development in the Americas and profiles major companies engaged in the tire business... . The study provides data on operations of the top 50 enterprises of global tire industry, presents information on production capability and development trend of the top 50 enterprises of global tire industry. The report informs of the investment of major global tire enterprises in China... . The report provides information on development environment, productivity changes, competition and development of China's caustic soda industry. The study presents major enterprises and their operations, offers information on import and export and influence of the international financial crisis on the industry... . The report provides forecast on investment opportunities and development in China's blood products industry. The research presents an analysis on market demand, major enterprises, policies of China's blood products industry... . The research analyses current situation of China's animal vaccine market and technology. The study presents major enterprises of the industry and their operations, prospects for the development, informs of China's import and export situation...
More new market research reports by CRI can be found at http://marketpublishers.com/members/shcri/info.html
CONTACTS
The Market Publishers, Ltd.
Mrs. Alla Martin
Tel: +44-208-123-2220
Fax: +44-207-900-3970
ps@marketpublishers.com
http://www.marketpublishers.com SOURCE The Market Publishers Ltd

description.hltext_display: SmarTrend Watching for Potential Pullback in Shares of Polo Ralph Lauren After 1.52% Gain (RL)
description.content:
Polo Ralph Lauren (NYSE:RL) traded in a range yesterday that spanned from a low of $113.08 to a high of $115.45. Yesterday, the shares gained 1.52%, which took the trading range above the 3-day high of $114.76 on volume of 641,000 shares. Often times after large one-day gains, short term traders will seek to take profits and, as such, investors should be cautious.
Shares of Polo Ralph Lauren are currently trading above their 50-day moving average (MA) of $103.57 and above their 200-day MA of $88.85. Look for the MA to provide support for a short-term pullback in the shares.
SmarTrend currently has shares of Polo Ralph Lauren in an Uptrend and issued the Uptrend alert on September 09, 2010 at $81.95. The stock has risen 38.6% since the Uptrend alert was issued.
SmarTrend expects the share price to pullback toward the $114.76 support level. Afterwards, we expect it to move upward with its peers in the SmarTrend Textile- Apparel Clothing industry.
Keywords: polo ralph lauren trading range stock news

Renovar com o Saint-Ãtienne sempre foi meu desejo, porque me sinto bem aqui. O clube tem algo que outros clubes nÃ£o tÃªm." Perrin comeÃ§ou sua carreira no prÃ³prio Saint-Ãtienne, em 2003.
O tÃ©cnico dos Verts, Christophe Galtier, jÃ¡ havia confirmado que ficaria atÃ© 2014 no clube, na semana passada.

description.hltext_display: Surviving all that holiday togetherness
description.author: Joy Batteh-Freiha
description.content:
By Joy Batteh-Freiha For weeks, you've been preparing for the arrival of out-of-town guests for the holidays.
The house is clean and festively decorated. There are fresh linens in the guest bedroom, and the smell of Christmas is throughout the house.
Oh, such a magical time of year, the holidays, with all the hectic schedules, overly active children brimming with excitement in anticipation of the arrival of the red-suited honored guest, and crowded living spaces, even if only temporary.
If your home will serve as Party Central for the holidays, beware of opening your door to unsavory guests of the germy variety, ready to squelch the joy out of your holiday spirit.
Here's some advice from local health care professionals.
Say no to germs
One way to keep out or at least minimize germs and other icky stuff from your house is to take off your shoes before coming in. Shoes carry in substances from every where we walked, said Joseph Czerkawski, a family physician with Baptist Primary Care Downtown. Ask guests to leave them at the door, and as a treat, place a basket of fuzzy socks near the door to double as gifts, suggested Evie.
Although in most cases sharing is a good thing, it's not when it comes to sharing towels. Make sure your guests have their own set of towels, advised Czerkawski and his wife, Evie, a family physician as well who raises their five children full time. If possible, they suggested, use disposable guest towels.
While nothing replaces good hand-washing practices to remove bacteria and viruses, hand-sanitizer bottles and boxes of tissues available around the house will help encourage your guests to keep cleanliness in mind.
And while these tips are a smart start to keeping germs at bay, eating balanced meals and getting some exercise through activities such as taking a walk after dinner will help with your fight against germs and illnesses.
Protect the young and old
When older guests are expected, make sure hallways and walkways are clear of clutter, throw rugs and other hazards that may potentially cause a fall. "Even if older guests have not had a fall in their own home, your home is an unfamiliar environment," said Joseph Czerkawski. He advised adding lights to walkways, making sure handrails are secure and, if possible, installing a grab bar in the bathroom. "These small things will make guests feel welcome and take notice of your care for their well-being," said Evie Czerkawski.
When it comes to protecting younger houseguests, a little more attention to detail is required.
For instance, make sure electrical outlets are covered as well as burners on the stove. If you have a pool, a safety gate is a must.
The Czerkawskis said leaving snacks on the table for guests is a hospitable gesture, but you need to keep in mind that peanuts and candy can potentially be a choking hazard for young children.
Great Expectations
As if the holidays aren't stressful enough, your in-laws have decided to make the trip to your house for the holidays as well.
Unlike the relationships we have with our friends, family enjoys the privilege of being brutally honest and assertive with their "loving assaults," said David Chesire, a licensed psychologist with UF & Shands Jacksonville.
So, what's a daughter-in-law to do? Get real, he advises.
"Rather than strive for perfection, try setting your sights a bit lower," said Chesire. "Instead of shooting for blissful harmony, a more realistic expectation would be peaceful coexistence."
Also, make a point to spend time with all your guests rather than one or two. Chesire even suggests assigning your in-laws a task or two to minimize complaints.
If all else fails, Chesire recommends planning a great escape.
"As much as we love our families, being locked up in close quarters with these people is a recipe for an all-out war," said Chesire. "We all need a place we can retreat, collect ourselves, and recharge before returning to the front line."
joy.battehfreiha@jacksonv

description.hltext_display: US gives thumbs up to Intel buying McAfee
description.author: Nick Farrell
description.content:
While antitrust watchdogs snuffle around the hindquarters of Intel's plan to buy security outfit McAfee , the US regulators have given the deal the thumbs up.
The US. Federal Trade Commission cleared the Intel $7.68 billion deal which could be sorted out next year if the EU agrees. The EU doesn't seem to want to agree, however, as we reported earlier this week .
In mid-October, Chipzilla said the transaction could close as early as the end of 2010 or in the first quarter of 2011.
Now with the EU asking Intel's rivals what they think of the cunning plan, it looks like it will take until the first half of next year.
The chip maker said on its website it is continuing to work with the European Commission on its review.
Baird analyst Tristan Gerra told the Wall Street Journal that it was expected that the FTC would do what it was told.
Intel has done a good job of explaining to the regulators why it wanted to buy a security company and how the deal would fit in the industry.
Intel, in August, said it would be buying McAfee to help it expand beyond providing chips for personal computers. The company also said the acquisition would allow it to build security into computer chips and other hardware, making products more resistant to attack.
While Intel is certain that everything will work out, the European Union's antitrust regulator is a little worried that Intel will come up with some cunning plan that will shut down others in the security industry by forcing its chips to only respond well to McAfee software.
But Intel cannot be that evil, or at least that stupid. After the EU slapped a huge anti-trust fine on Chipzilla, the regulators have been watching the outfit like a hawk.

event_or_fact.property: it was expected that the FTC would do what it was told.

description.hltext_display: Girl, 16, reports near-abduction
description.content:
STOCKTON - A 16-year-old girl was nearly abducted Monday evening in north Stockton but escaped to report the attempt.
The Stockton Police Department said the girl was walking with a friend about 5 p.m. Monday on Alexandria Place south of Hammer Lane when a white Toyota pickup stopped alongside them. A man got out and tried to push the girl into the pickup.
When he proved unable to force the girl inside, police said, he kissed her and groped her. The girl broke free, and she and her friend ran.
The assailant was not described in detail. The girl said he was 25 to 30 years old and was wearing a blue jumpsuit. His pickup was a 2000 model or similar and had a white rack in its bed. There were weeds in the bed, the girl told police.

description.hltext_display: Undemocratic forces active to destabilize country. Sharmila Farooqi
description.content:
(Nazir Siyal) Advisor to Chief Minister Sindh for Information, Sharmila Farooqi has said on Sunday that we are in a war-like situation and facing regular criticism by the undemocratic forces, they are active in destabilizing the country and current situation of country is passing through a difficult time of hour. This she said while talking to the newsmen in press conference here at Circuit House Larkana.
Advisor to Chief Minister Sindh for Information said no one destabilizes the present government and PPP government will complete its five years tenure and continue struggle for the development of masses and country stability she said.
She said the Bhutto martyred but the party is continue serving the masses and simultaneously Shaheed Benazir Bhutto sacrificed her life for the people of country towards the democracy and change of system in country and hoped that they will complete five years even the difficult situations and terrorist activities those martyred several party workers, leaders and journalists of country she said.
Replying to a question about the killing of 80 journalists in three years PPP government, she said there are certain terrorist activities and media trial against the President Asif Ali Zardari to weakening the democratic government, those are creating conspiracies against ruling government, added that the dictators got 8 to 11 years rule on country but the political and democratic government has not fulfilled their tenure, because there are conspiracies against the democratic governments.
Sharmila Farooqi said PPP Ladies wing and Youth wing will led their big rallies to commemorate the sacrifices of party leaders specially on 3rd death anniversary of Benazir Bhutto on December 27, 2010. On the occasion, they will make promise and firm belief to struggle for the development of country through the vision of Shaheed Benazir Bhutto and Zulfikar Ali Bhuttoâs mission she said.
She said the present government has achieved tremendous objectives during three years among the restoration of 1973 constitution and President of Pakistan delegated his powers to the parliament within the stipulated time according to the promise. The present government has made 16 MoU with the China government and various development projects and successful marathon for International visits for the economic development of country, adding that the partyâs reconciliation towards the achievement of the objectives of country and its development is continue with spirit.
She said for the alternate energy and Thar coal, 10 billion dollars by the federal government and Sindh government has been allocated to end the power crises in country, while IPPs and wind energy is in pipe line for the future country development she said.
Advisor to Chief Minister Sindh for Information said the media should comeforward to play its role for the country development and institutional building, if the opposition wants new election, they should wait for another mid term election and the people will disqualify them she said.
Earlier, the Advisor to Chief Minister Sindh for Information, Sharmila Farooqi visited Garhi Khuda Bux Bhutto and laid floral wreaths on the Mazars of Shaheed Zulfikar Ali Bhutto, Shaheed Benazir Bhutto, Shahnawaz Bhutto, Mir Murtaza Bhutto, Sheerin Ameer Begum and others.
On the occasion, Secretary Information Sindh, Syed Mumtaz Ali Shah, Director General Information Abul Aziz Uqaili, Director Information Tariq Hussain Khero, District Coordination Officer Larkana Abdul Aleem Lashari, Regional Director Information Gul Hassan Arbani, PPP leaders were on the occasion.
Later, Advisor to Chief Minister Sindh for Information inaugurated the stall established by the Sindh Chambers of Agriculture Siraj Ahmed Rashdi, where different subsidized edibles among Guava are being sold on fifty percent discount rates here at Naudero.
She also distributed certificates amongst the women trainees of SBBYDP in Beauty Parlor training course at Resham Gali Larkana.
Several students of SBBYDP accorded warm welcome and showered rose petals on her arrival at VIP beauty parlor and training center.
On the occasion, Advisor to Chief Minister Sindh for Information Sharmila Farooqi also administered Oath from newly elected office bearers of Photographers and Cameramen Association here at Larkana Press Club

description.hltext_display: Same Day Business Loan â Business Instant Loan
description.content: Some time in business due to shortage of working capital cause unnecessarily delay in important work due to which our whole business process got affected. Uncertainty and risk is two most common factors or even we can say it is the nature of business which can't be changed. Same Day Business loan can't change the business nature but it can help you to combat with these factors to a little extent. It helps a business man by providing him a loan at low rate of interest at the time of temporarily financial crisis in the business.Same Day Business loan understand that different business have different requirements therefore it provide you number of loan schemes from which you can choose according to your need and requirements. Due to these types of loans a business man is not required to waste his time in clearing paper formality or any paper checks. It is very easy to avail such types of loan by just filling up an online form. While filling up an online form you just need to take care of few things which are required to get your application approved those are:- 1) Your age must cross 18 years. 2) Your must have a valid bank account. 3) You must earn at least Â£1000 per month. 4) You have to assure that you will repay back loan on time. These loans are provided to you without any collateral or paper checks therefore these types of loans have short life and are to be paid back within the maximum time of 31 days. Generally short term business loan are of heavy and high rate of interest. But lenders of these loans are genuine and charge fair rate of interest and service fee. No hidden charges will be charged on the borrower for the loan. People with bad credit history such as:-late payments, bad debts etc, can also apply for these loans. Providers of the loans are the selected and reliable lenders. They take quick action and provide you cash within 24 hours. Business man need not required to visit any office as all the work done will be in electronic form on the net.

description.hltext_display: DUI sweep nets dozens on weekend
description.content:
STOCKTON - A weekend crackdown on drunken driving in San Joaquin County netted dozens of arrests, but at least one person was killed while driving drunk, the Police Department reported.
The Avoid the 10 program, a grant-funded effort to curtail drunken driving, started this past weekend with heavy patrols and warrant sweeps.
Arrests were still being tallied, the Police Department reported, but from midnight Friday to midnight Sunday, at least 17 people were arrested on suspicion of drunken driving. The local California Highway Patrol office, which also sought drunken drivers in its jurisdiction over the weekend, reported it arrested as many as 49 people on suspicion of drunken driving between Saturday and Sunday.
The Police Department reported one man was killed after driving away from a nightclub and hitting a utility pole and a structure. The man was under the influence of alcohol, police said. His passenger was injured.
On Saturday, San Joaquin County probation officers served warrants on people wanted for offenses that included driving under the influence, making seven arrests.
Funding for the Avoid the 10 program is provided by the state Office of Traffic Safety through the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration.

description.hltext_display: Henry e Anelka ainda nÃ£o desistiram dos prÃªmios da Copa
description.content:
Postado em 21/12/2010 Ã s 12:11 por Equipe Trivela.com
Atacante foi um dos "protagonistas" da seleÃ§Ã£o na Copa
ApÃ³s toda confusÃ£o protagonizada pelos jogadores franceses na Copa do Mundo da Ãfrica do Sul, quando se rebelaram contra o treinador Raymond Domenech, ficou acertado com a FederaÃ§Ã£o Francesa de Futebol (FFF) que eles nÃ£o receberiam as premiaÃ§Ãµes da competiÃ§Ã£o. Passados quase cinco meses do vexame, nem todos atletas formalizaram o acordado, casos de Nicolas Anelka e Thierry Henry.
"Eles ainda nÃ£o responderam, mas tambÃ©m nÃ£o recusaram", afirmou FranÃ§ois Manardo, diretor de comunicaÃ§Ã£o da federaÃ§Ã£o.
Segundo o jornal francÃªs LibÃ©ration, os dois jogadores, na verdade, se recusaram a assinar a documentaÃ§Ã£o, desistindo dos bÃ´nus.
No mÃªs passado, Fernand Duchaussoy, presidente da FFF, divulgou que todos os atletas haviam acertado a desistÃªncia - no total, os prÃªmios somam aproximadamente â¬ 3 milhÃµes. No Mundial deste ano, a FranÃ§a foi eliminada ainda na primeira fase da competiÃ§Ã£o, sem uma Ãºnica vitÃ³ria.

description.hltext_display: Over 350 graduate from Ardhi University this year
description.content:
Over 350 students were conferred with various diplomas and degrees during Ardhi University (ARU) graduation ceremony held over the weekend in Dar es Salaam.
ARU chancellor Cleopa Msuya presided over the event.
In his speech before Msuya conferred the degrees, ARU Vice-Chancellor Prof Idrisa Mshoro said a total of 371 had qualified for different diplomas and degrees offered by the university.
He said they included two who got doctorate degrees, 18 who obtained masters degrees, 14 who got postgraduate diplomas, 260 - bachelors degrees and 6 diplomas.
Mshoro added that for the 2010/11 academic year, the university had increased the admission of students to 2,866, up from 2,150 the previous year.
On challenges facing the institution, he said there was limited intake capacity in the wake of annual increases in the number of secondary school leavers seeking higher education in various disciplines.
"There is a need to increase student intakes without compromising the quality of education being offered," he said.
Mshoro commended the government for allowing universities to hire some retired lecturers to curb the shortages of lecturers.
Other challenges he said, included infrastructural scarcity for studies, accommodation inadequacy and small subsidies from the government.

description.hltext_display: Payday Loans In 1 Hour - Mini Cash Advance In An Instant
description.content:
Do you need to meet the expenses of certain pending bills? Is your next salary day still away by 2 weeks and you need money to fulfill the bills? Without thinking much, apply for payday loans in 1 hour. By going with this fiscal service, the borrower can get hold of mini cash advance in an instant.
The process of application is very simple with no obligation and free of cost online application form. Such a form for payday loans in hour would be given on the websites of the money lenders. Fill the form with your genuine personal information. Do it from the comfort of your home or office. Once the process of application is over, the borrower gets an instant approval. The approved cash advance would get into your bank account in just a day's time.
The electronic transaction of funds makes the hassle of filling or faxing of papers zero. You would not get into the trouble of any kind of unwanted documentation.
Â£80 and Â£1500 is the range between which the borrower can assemble money that he is required to settle in the suitable repayment time span of 1 to 30 days. You would get deals that are as per your settlement capacity and fiscal capability. One can make use of the sanctioned sum to solve his interim wants until his following salary day. With this money you can pay your household and utility bills, can send the car in the garage, can get small house modifications done and so on.
Stained credit scores of the borrower are not a matter of concern for the money lenders as they do not follow the credit confirmation. The rate of interest of this short-term monetary money-providing cash is considerably quite high. Take note of your stability before applying.

description.hltext_display: Man Kills Neighbor With Shovel Over Snow Dispute
description.content:
By AFP - A bitter dispute over snow clearing in Germany ended in tragedy after a man smashed his neighbor over the head with a shovel, killing him on the spot, police said Tuesday.
Following what police described as "years of arguing," the two neighbors, aged 45 and 49, got into a heated discussion over who was responsible for removing snow from the joint entrance to their properties, authorities said.
The 45-year-old then hit his neighbor, 49, over the head with the shovel. "He was so badly injured that he died on the spot," said police spokesman Lutz Flassnoecker.
The attack took place in the tiny town of Schnellenbach, in western Germany.
Police declined to give out the names but mass circulation daily Bild named the 45-year-old as father-of-eight Abdulbah I. and the 49-year-old victim as Wolfgang K.
Bild quoted another Schnellenbach resident as saying that the victim had "frequently provoked" his neighbor. The paper said the row stemmed from the fact that the victim had built his house too close to his neighbor's, depriving him of his view.
Wolfgang K. leaves behind a son Marco, 17, and a daughter Jenny, 13, who last year also lost their mother to a heart attack, according to Bild.
Police in nearby Cologne have set up a murder investigation, Flassnoecker said.
Like most of northern Europe, Germany has for weeks been blanketed with a thick layer of snow.

event_or_fact.property: another Schnellenbach resident as saying that the victim had "frequently provoked" his neighbor
He was so badly injured that he died on the spot
Police in nearby Cologne have set up a murder investigation

description.hltext_display: Jury rejects insanity defense
description.content:
Manteca man convicted of killing wife will be sent to prison, not hospital
Jesse Refugio Tellez
Record Staff Writer
STOCKTON - Jurors took less than 30 minutes Tuesday to decide that a Manteca man was sane when he stabbed his wife to death while she held their 3-year-old son.
The attorney for Jesse Tellez, 50, had argued that his client was not guilty by reason of insanity. If jurors had agreed, Tellez would have gone to a state mental hospital for an indeterminate period of time.
The same jury had found Tellez guilty of murder last Wednesday.
With the jury's finding, Tellez is expected to be sentenced to state prison for at least 25 years to life for murdering Tevanie Tellez, 35, on July 2, 2009, near their South Veach Avenue duplex.
San Joaquin County Deputy Public Defender Tai Bogan said Jesse Tellez had worked for a decade at San Joaquin General Hospital, and part of his job was wheeling corpses from the hospital to the morgue.
That caused him to snap, Bogan said. Tellez talked of hearing the dead people call out his name and feeling them touch him, said Bogan, who noted that his client also had head injuries.
"I really truly believe he was insane," Bogan said.
Yet San Joaquin County Deputy District Attorney Sherri Adams argued before jurors that Jesse Tellez also chose to drink alcohol and use drugs. Tellez had a history of domestic violence against his wife, she said.
"He's not suffering from mental illness," Adams said. "He's just mean."
Tevanie Tellez's aunt, Roberta Roberts, said outside court that she hoped other women involved in abusive relationships would learn from their family tragedy. Her relatives had urged Tevanie Tellez to leave her husband when they saw her black eyes and bruises, Roberts said.
"Get out while you still can," Roberts said. "It really can happen to you."
Jesse and Tevanie Tellez's son, 4, and daughter, 13, are doing well and living with foster families, relatives said.
San Joaquin County Superior Court Judge Seth Hoyt, who oversaw the trial, is scheduled to sentence Jesse Tellez to state prison Feb. 7.
Contact reporter Scott Smith at (209) 546-8296 or ssmith@recordnet.com. Visit his blog at recordnet.com/smithblog.

description.hltext_display: Survey says 'No!' to Rome F1 GP
description.content:
A substantial survey of Rome's residents has come up with the answer to 'Do you want an F1 GP in your city?'
Organisers claim preparations are on track for such an inaugural race in the Italian capital in 2012 or 2013 but Ferrari team boss Stefano Domenicali threw cold water on the project when he said "one country, one race".
...OR WAS IT FIXED?
Now a survey by the Italian Democratic Party has shown that, of the 2138 respondents polled, 1750 said they saw "more disadvantages than advantages" from a GP on Rome's streets. Strike one for Domenicali.
The results, published in Italian motoring publications, show more than 80% of Romans don't want the project but promoter Maurizio Flammini insisted that only a minority of the population had expressed itself.
The survey also showed that 93% of Romans believed the race would increase traffic and pollution and create excessive noise.
Flammini charged: "This referendum was designed to give voice to opponents of the GP."

event_or_fact.property: only a minority of the population had expressed itself.

description.hltext_display: Pakistani Church leaders say Article 295 misused against minorities.
description.content:
(By Abbas Kassar) The leaders of newly formed Hyderabad Churches Alliance have observed that article 295-C of criminal law was being misused. They said that its aim to promulgate was respect and sanctity of prophets of all religions but due to its misuse not only Christians but other religious minorities were also feeling uneasy. It was being used to settle personal scores as such the innocent people were being made its target. Addressing press conference and later replying to questions of newsmen here on Monday the leader of newly formed Hyderabad Churches Alliance.
Father Victor M.Dean said that Christians of Pakistan had given sacrifices for creation of Pakistan and they were very much patriot citizens of this country. He said no Christian could ever think of talking against Islam and its prophet Muhammad (PBUH) and that they also have deep respect for Islam as such none among them could commit blasphemy. He said that a Christian woman Asiya Bibi was in jail as she was sentenced to death by a court. He thanked Christians and also Muslims for raising voice for her. He said the aims and objects of forming new alliance was to get all Church leaders of Hyderabad region on one platform so that they could extend congratulations to all Christians on the eve of Christmas 2010 and new year 2011.He said that the purpose of advent of Christ in this world was to provide peace, security, brotherhood and conciliation. He said that all Christians including Church leaders were all pray for security, integrity and development of Pakistan He said Christian have also role in making Pakistan and at present they were united with Muslim brothers like a
wall to offer every kind of sacrifice for sake of country. He informed that the alliance has completed its 4 years and it was providing spiritual, ethical and legal help to its Christian community.
Later the Christians and Church leaders prayed for the integrity and prosperity of Pakistan. A Christmas cake was also sliced on the occasion and distributed. On this occasion Christopher Paul, Kadok Shahzad, Albert Riaz, Minsha M.Gill, Yousuf Prince, Bishop Younis Gill, Riasat Masih and Sohan Lal were present during the program.

description.hltext_display: Jewelry loans Union Square â Get the best one on the web!
description.content:
The best way of getting loans very easily is through pawning. This is a very interesting concept and can offer you loan for whatever amount you want only if you have an asset of similar amount to pawn. In pawning you will have to give an asset to the pawn broker as a security measure and depending on certain predetermined percentage of the current market value of your asset you will be provided the loan. So, basically in pawning the biggest thing that matter is the asset that you pawn. Therefore make sure that you choose such an asset that has a very high monetary so that you can get high value as loan. The best option that you can have among your assets to pawn is the jewelry. The main reason to choose jewelry is that these have a very high fiscal value in the market and mainly the price always keeps on fluctuating. This makes them evergreen in the market of pawning.
There are many pawn shops where you can get Jewelry loans Union Square. But the best part about this today is that you can get them on the web too. Today with the increasing popularity of the internet and the increasing craze among people round the globe, many of the pawn brokers have also joined the web. This change has now made lots of web uses get in touch with the pawn brokers very easily. So if at all you want good Jewelry loans Union Square then you can also opt for this option and get the best kind of loan for your emergency requirement.
Hunting for the Jewelry loans Union Square providers on the web is really very easy. You just have to know which the best way for it is. There are many popular search engines on the web that has the capacity of getting the best results on the web. When you enter your key term in the search engine only the best search engine will give you the most suitable result. But you will also have to be very much careful regarding the selection of your key term. A good key word will automatically give you a good result.
But when you look out for the providers of the Jewelry loans Union Square on the web you will have to be open for more options. So make sure that you look at for options too and do not stick to one website or provider.

description.hltext_display: Quintana Roo Doing Holiday Giveaway
description.content: OOLTEWAH, TN (BRAIN)For the second year in a row, Quintana Roo (QR) will partner with Infinit Nutrition to give away a new 2011 CD0.1 frameset at midnight on January 1. The giveaway is part of a holiday promotion in which one lucky winner will be chosen and contacted by Infinit Nutrition CEO, Michael Folan. Peter Hurley, CEO of American Bicycle Groups QR, praises the promotion for its consumer focus. He said, Promotions like this are great to be a part of because they excite consumers and drive traffic to our dealers. It is a win-win situation for all involved. Additionally, the cross-marketing partnership with Infinit gets our products in front of an audience that may not necessarily be very familiar with QRs dealer network. Named for the low coefficient of drag in the wind tunnel, the CD0.1 uses QRs premier Shift Technology for aerodynamic advantage in triathlon and is priced at $2,600. The CD0.1 frameset includes the high modulus carbon frame, aero carbon fork, headset, and front and rear brakesets. At the completion of the contest, the winner will visit his nearest local QR dealer to choose the appropriate size, get a photo taken for the QR blog, and get a free bag of Infinit customized nutrition. To register for the 2011 QR frameset giveaway, click on above link.

event_or_fact.property: Promotions like this are great to be a part of because they excite consumers and drive traffic to our dealers

description.hltext_display: A haven for littlest homeless
description.content:
Children find stable, nurturing environment at one.TLC school
Siblings Robert Guerrero, 11, and Divina Guerrero, 8, work on art projects at the one.TLC school for homeless children in Stockton.Ariel Zambelich/Special to The Record
Record Staff Writer
STOCKTON - Divina Guerrero, 8, opened a plastic bin about the size of a shoe box.
"I got my Play-Doh, I got my maps," she said, pulling things out one at a time. "I got my chocolates, I got my crayons."
Divina's mother, Veronica Lopez, said the box has become her daughter's traveling bedroom.
Helping the homeless
Homeless students in San Joaquin County need basic hygiene items such as toothpaste as well as new socks, underwear, towels, sweatshirts, backpacks and clothing.
To donate directly to one.TLC, write to knight.mk@sbcglobal.net or P.O. Box 83, Woodbridge, CA 95258.
To contribute to homeless children educated throughout the county, write to the SJCOE Educational Foundation at P.O. Box 213030 Stockton, CA 95213; or contact Mark Yost at (209) 468-9079 or myost@sjcoe.net.
Other agencies that serve the homeless include:
â¢ Stockton Shelter for the Homeless: (209) 939-9733 or stocktonshelter.com
â¢ Gospel Center Rescue Mission, Stockton: (209) 466-2138 or gcrms.org
â¢ St. Mary's Interfaith Community Services, Stockton: (209) 467-0703 or Â­stmarysinterfaith.org
â¢ McHenry House, Tracy: (209) 835-2328 or Â­mchenryhousetracy.org
â¢ Lodi House: (209) 334-6346 or lodihouse.org
â¢ Hope Ministries, Manteca: (209) 824-0658
"I tell her, 'If it fits, you can keep it.' "
Three years ago, Lopez; her husband, David; and their two children were living at the Stockton Family Shelter, completing counseling for drug addiction and planning an escape.
Within five years, the couple had said, they wanted to earn enough money to buy land "in the country." They wanted to raise animals. They wanted a quiet life.
They made it out of the shelter and into employment. But the climb is slow, stability is fragile, and the family is homeless again, sharing a 25-foot trailer with David Lopez's sister, so small that Divina's brother, 11-year-old Robert, must stay with other relatives.
"We were doing real well until I quit my job for who knows what reason," Veronica Lopez said. A careless moment of rash frustration that she now regrets.
And then, her husband's wages were garnisheed - they believe by mistake - so for two days of work, he took home a little more than $3.
"That really threw us for a loop," Lopez said.
They lost their home, they sold their car, and one of the first phone calls Lopez made when everything was unraveling was to the one.TLC school for homeless children.
"I know that the school is very nurturing to my children at this time," she said. "It's embarrassing for them to be going into shelters. It's embarrassing for them to hear their parents screaming at each other about finances."
At TLC, she said, "everyone's going through something. It feels good that in our time of hardship, we're not being judged."
Founded about 20 years ago by California State University, Stanislaus, Professor Sara Garfield, TLC offers students schooling as well as clothing, supplies, counseling, and referrals to medical and dental care.
It is operated by Garfield, the San Joaquin County Office of Education and the Stockton Unified School District, and it works to create a stable environment for children who, because of homelessness, are academically and socially vulnerable.
At their former school, Veronica Lopez said, Robert was getting into fights, and Divina just couldn't concentrate - she couldn't even remember her phone number - as stress at home mounted.
"The child does take that to school with her the next morning," she said. "Where are we going to be living? Where's my dog going to go?"
Last week at TLC, on one of the last days before winter break, teacher Gail Jones gave the children Christmas ornaments to decorate as they waited for the school day to end.
When Lopez arrived, Divina ran up to her and handed her a card.
"Hi Mom," it said. "I love you. Happy Holidays Mom and Dad."
Lopez told her it was beautiful.
"Little stuff like this, for a kid to give us, it means a lot to her," she said.
Divina went home (they got a ride from another teacher) with two stickers on her sweatshirt, earned because she "cleaned someone else's mess," she said.
She cleared some space at a small table - "that's my area" - and opened her box.
"My mom's going to get us an apartment," she said. "But it's big."
Contact reporter Jennifer Torres at (209) 546-8252 or jtorres@recordnet.com. Visit her blog at recordnet.com/parentingblog.

description.hltext_display: Bike Rentals Reveal Top Shops
description.content: CHICAGO, IL (BRAIN)An analysis of bike rental reservations across the United States has revealed stand out bike shops and rental statistics for comparison. The data, compiled by nationwide bike rental network RentaBikeNow.com is the first national snapshot of bike rental reservations and establishes a benchmark as the countrys bike friendliness continues to grow, according to a press release. "Perhaps the question we get most often is: How much does the average rental bike cost?" said George Gill, company president and founder. The answer, Gill reports is $35.63 per day, which hes quick to point out is an average of many bike types, rental shops and geographic locations. The number reflects daily rates for everything from $15 Florida beach cruisers to $85 high-end carbon road bikes in California, and everything in between.the average reservation is made 12.8 days in advance. While stats are interesting, the final evaluation goes beyond price and is heavily weighted by a renters specific experience at a bike shop. Were you an inconvenience at pick-up or were you treated like Lance Armstrong? To capture this critical element, RentaBikeNow.com sends satisfaction surveys via email to every renter after their bike has been returned. The growing pool of data paints a clearer picture of who the best bike shops are and what makes them great. The highest ranking shops share three common characteristics: customer focused attitude, flexibility and employee training. While attitude and training are fairly straight forward, flexibility centers around a shop's willingness to make minor adjustments and ensure the fit and bike condition are good. Accordingly, proper tire pressure goes a long way. Success in these areas has been a major driver in RentaBikeNow.coms first Rental Shop of the Year Awards. With over 300 participating shops in the RentaBikeNow.com network, the winners were recognized in four regions based on time zones. Bike supply and fair pricing were other factors used in selecting this years winners who are: PACIFIC: San Diego Bike Shop, San Diego, CA: Very decent bike and very good service . . . - Andre H. Its hard to miss the bright smile of owner Mo Karimi. With a convenient downtown location and a helpful attitude, a great rental experience is assured. MOUNTAIN: Bicycles Unlimited, St. George, UT Great staff! I arrived just at quitting time and they stayed over to set me up. - Thomas C. A truly professional bike shop with arguably some of the best riding in the country merely a stones throw away. CENTRAL: Bike Barn, Houston, TX The Bike Barn was great and they did a complete bike fitting for a simple rental. - Richard D. Six convenient locations with consistent customer service that customers consistently rave about. EAST: RoadFish Bike Shop, Hilton Head, SC They are super friendly and great to work with. - David I. If its hard to choose between a cycling or a beach vacation, get both! This shop offers a broad selection and great service that even includes delivery for a buck!

event_or_fact.property: Perhaps the question we get most often is: How much does the average rental bike cost?

description.hltext_display: Re-released report adds nothing to the case for Income Management
description.author: ChrisRedman
description.content:
Media Release | Spokesperson Rachel Siewert
in
Over a year after the release of a draft report caused a furore â when the Minister Jenny Macklin unjustifiably claimed it provided evidence to support continuing controversial measures in Aboriginal communities in Northern Territory â the release of the âfinalâ report adds nothing to the case for income management, according to the Greens.
âWe are yet to see any strong and credible evidence that this expensive and punitive policy is delivering on any of its promised outcomes,â Senator Rachel Siewert, Greens spokesperson on Aboriginal Issues said today.
âThe findings of this report on the reliability and validity of the evidence collected by FaHCSIA were damning and over twelve months sitting on a shelf have done nothing to change that,â said Senator Siewert.
The analysis of the FaHCSIA data by AIHW led them to conclude that âthe overall evidence about the effectiveness of income management was not strongâ, saying that the data âwould sit towards the bottom of an evidence hierarchyâ.
âOver a year later, with only a sentence changed here and there, the âfinalâ version of this report has finally been released on one of the last reporting days of the year, in what we might be led to conclude is an effort to avoid further controversy and embarrassment,â Senator Siewert said.
âThe report does not provide any quantitative data on actual health outcomes and relies on a small client survey and a handful of focus group interviews in four selected communities.
âOpinion and hearsay is not a basis for decision making for a government that claims it is committed to âevidence-basedâ policy.
âOver three years after the commencement of the intervention in the Northern Territory we are still waiting for the promised evidence. It looks like there may be more waiting to come,â Senator Siewert concluded.

description.hltext_display: Betsson AB: Betsson Opens up the Shop Again
description.content:
STOCKHOLM Regulatory News: Today at 15:00 Betsson (STO:BETSB.st - News) will open the shop at GÃ¶tgatan 37 in Stockholm - for the third time.
Since the Supreme Administrative Court, in September, refused leave to appeal and refrained from making a reference for a preliminary ruling from the European Court of Justice, the shop has been kept closed. Now, Betsson has decided to open the shop again but this time Betsson has been enforced to comply with the Gaming Boardâs injunction from 2008 which means that none of Betssonâs symbols or logos will be available in the shop.
After rulings in September made by the European Court of Justice, Betsson believes there is a support for an opening of the shop.
âSince it is legal to offer gaming services to Betsson's customers, we will continue fighting for the Swedish consumerâs right to a free choice of games which should be given âsaid Pontus Lindwall, CEO Betsson.
BETSSON ABâS OPERATIONS INVOLVE INVESTING IN AND MANAGING COMPANIES WHICH PROVIDE ONLINE GAMING SERVICES TO END-CUSTOMERS. BETSSON AB OWNS BETSSON MALTA WHICH OPERATES GAMES THROUGH PARTNERSHIPS AND TOWARDS END CUSTOMERS VIA WWW.BETSSON.COM, WWW.CASINOEURO.COM AND WWW.CHERRYCASINO.COM. BETSSON MALTA OFFERS POKER, CASINO, CARD GAMES, LOTTERY, BINGO AND GAMES. CUSTOMERS ARE PRIMARILY FROM THE NORDIC REGION AND THE REST OF EUROPE. BETSSON AB IS LISTED ON OMX NASDAQ NORDIC MID CAP LIST, (BETS).
This information was brought to you by Cision http://www.cisionwire.com

description.hltext_display: Allen Sports Bucks Bulky Product Trend
description.content: VERO BEACH, FL (BRAIN)Ask Alex Allen how his rack business has fared in light of a down economy and youll sense a bit of hesitation. He timidly admits his company has hung in there pretty well, but hes not one to boast, or let the competition in on the secrets of his success. We havent had a down year since 1993, said Allen, president of Allen Sports, a company his father started in 1965 out of his garage. Were chugging along and we continue to focus on what we do. Allen said his company, whose line extends from hitch to trunk and even parking racks, has made its name at the value end of the spectrum. There are rack makers that sell racks that retail at $200 and up. Thats not us, Allen said. We give dealers a product they can make a full margin on but thats positioned at the $40 to $50 opening price point. Our objective is to give a dealer that opening price point that keeps a customer in the store. And while he said the trend in racks recently has been toward bigger and bulkier product, hes taking a different tack. The newest trunk racks in his lineup, the MT1 and MT2, fold down and come packaged in a box smaller than a shoebox. Theyre targeted toward bike commuters with a super compact design0.8 cubic feetthat allows them to carry it in a backpack or messenger bagshould they need to hitch a ride on a rainy day. We saw a need for something thats really small, Allen said. It offers a lot of advantages in terms of freight and it gives dealers an opportunity to merchandise trunk racks in a much smaller space. The racks, which can carry one or two bikes, begin shipping in January from Allen Sports factory in China and are available through six U.S. distributors. The one-bike model will retail for $55 to $60; the two-bike model for $80. Allen said initial reaction to the first samples has been strong with core customers. As someone whos grown up in the bike rack segment, Ive seen it all and this ones different. It comes fully assembled and folds down into a tiny little package. Thats what makes this new, he said.

description.hltext_display: TFK's Price Receives President's Award
description.content: SAN RAFAEL, CA (BRAIN)The President's Council on Fitness, Sports & Nutrition (PCFSN) has chosen Marilyn Price to receive a 2010 PCFSN Community Leadership Award. The award is given annually to individuals who improve the lives of individuals within their community by providing or enhancing opportunities to engage in sports, physical activities, fitness or nutrition-related programs, according to a press release. The longtime environmentalist and bicycle enthusiast Price uses her passions to improve the lives of at-risk children. In 1986, Price founded Trips for Kids (TFK), a nonprofit organization that opens the world of cycling to at-risk youth through mountain bike rides and Earn-a-Bike programs. Today the organization has more than 70 chapters located throughout the United States, Canada and Israel. "It is our pleasure to present this award to Marilyn Price," says Shellie Pfohl, executive director of the President's Council on Fitness, Sports & Nutrition. "Physical activity and good nutrition are important components of living a healthy lifestyle, and we are pleased to recognize individuals like Marilyn Price who are committed to making a difference and positively influencing the health of their communities." "Trips for Kids is overjoyed to be the recipient of this prestigious award," said Marilyn Price, founding director of TFK. "Recognition from the President's Council will significantly boost our visibility and encourage more people to sign up as Trips for Kids chapters." This year, the President's Council presented the Community Leadership Award to 28 individuals across the country for making sports, physical activity, fitness, and nutrition-related programs available in their communities.

description.hltext_display: Anti-terror Alliance Over if U.S. Troops Raid Across Border, Pakistan Warns
description.content:
(NewsCore) - Pakistan warned the United States Tuesday that the counter-terrorism alliance between the two countries would be broken if Washington attempted to expand its ground war across the border from Afghanistan into Pakistani territory.
The stark warning came after the US military reportedly pressed for permission to open a second front against militants by using special forces in cross-border raids into Pakistan. One officer said: Ã¢WeÃ¢ve never been as close as we are now to getting the go-ahead.Ã¢
American military officials told The New York Times that commanders had drawn up plans to attack Taliban and al Qaeda sanctuaries in Pakistan. They had concluded that Islamabad had no intention of dislodging the militants, who are concentrated in the lawless tribal area of North Waziristan.
The officials said they were pushing for the White House to adopt the plan as a means of allowing a troop drawdown to begin as scheduled next year.
Abdul Basit, the Pakistani Foreign Ministry spokesman, reacted angrily to the suggestion that Islamabad would allow such incursions, adding: Ã¢We have drawn a red line and any move to cross it will have a serious consequence.Ã¢
Major-General Athar Abbas, PakistanÃ¢s chief military spokesman, insisted: Ã¢There is a clear understanding that the Pakistani and US-led coalition forces will operate on the respective sides of the border.Ã¢
A senior Afghan official told The (London) Times that the American cross-border plans were real, although he suggested that they were intended more to exert pressure on the Pakistanis than to prepare for an imminent incursion. Ã¢It is true but mainly symbolically and mere warning,Ã¢ the official said.
The New York Times report was denied Tuesday by NATOÃ¢s deputy chief of communications in Afghanistan, US Rear Admiral Gregory Smith, who said that there was Ã¢absolutely no truthÃ¢ in it.
Signing off on special forces operations into Pakistan would effectively authorize the opening of a second front in the Afghan war, a high-risk strategy about which the White House remains highly skeptical.
Vice-President Joe Biden has previously advocated stepping up a campaign in Pakistan that could include special forces raids but did so as an alternative to the current troop surge in Afghanistan rather than as an added extra. White House officials fear that the political backlash from expanding the ground war into Pakistan would far outweigh any military or intelligence benefits.
Pressure is mounting on the Obama administration over how to ensure that the promised troop reduction in Afghanistan can begin on schedule next summer with increasing concerns being voiced about PakistanÃ¢s failure to tackle the source of the conflict -- the presence of Taliban sanctuaries on its soil.

event_or_fact.property: there was absolutely no truth in it.

description.hltext_display: Rama Yade en voie d'Ãªtre nommÃ©e ambassadrice Ã l'Unesco
description.content:
L'ex-secrÃ©taire d'Etat Rama Yade devrait Ãªtre nommÃ©e mercredi en Conseil des ministres ambassadrice, dÃ©lÃ©guÃ©e permanente de la France auprÃ¨s de l'Unesco en remplacement de Catherine Colonna, a-t-on appris de source proche du dossier, confirmant une information de RTL. Figurant parmi les personnalitÃ©s les plus populaires en France, Rama Yade, 34 ans, devrait Ãªtre nommÃ©e ambassadrice auprÃ¨s de l'Organisation des Nations unies pour l'Ã©ducation, la science et la culture, dont le siÃ¨ge est Ã Paris.
Ex porte-parole de l'ElysÃ©e sous Jacques Chirac, ex-ministre de Affaires europÃ©ennes, Catherine Colonna occupait cette fonction depuis 2008.
Rama Yade a Ã©tÃ© secrÃ©taire d'Etat aux droits de l'Homme (2007-2009) puis secrÃ©taire d'Etat aux Sports (2009-2010). AprÃ¨s avoir fait ses premiÃ¨res armes Ã l'UMP, poussÃ©e par Nicolas Sarkozy, elle a rejoint rÃ©cemment Jean-Louis Borloo au parti radical.
De la visite de Kadhafi Ã sa critique -tardive- du discours de Dakar, en passant par ses caprices Ã©lectoraux, la jeune femme, qui a eu 34 ans en dÃ©cembre, a incarnÃ© au gouvernement l'anti-conformisme plus que la "diversitÃ©", aux Droits de l'homme puis aux Sports.
NÃ©e Ã Dakar d'un couple d'enseignants proche de Senghor, elle est arrivÃ©e en France Ã onze ans. Elle est diplÃ´mÃ©e de Sciences po, administratrice du SÃ©nat, avant d'apparaÃ®tre pour la premiÃ¨re fois sous les feux des projecteurs le jour de l'investiture de Nicolas Sarkozy comme candidat UMP Ã l'Ã©lection prÃ©sidentielle en janvier 2007.
Battue aux municipales Ã Colombes en 2008, Rama Yade a tenu tÃªte Ã deux reprises au chef de l'Etat et Ã l'UMP en refusant de se prÃ©senter aux EuropÃ©ennes en 2009, puis en choisissant de se prÃ©senter dans les Hauts-de-Seine et non dans le Val-d'Oise aux rÃ©gionales de 2010.

description.hltext_display: Watch for Estee Lauder to Potentially Pullback after Gaining 1.29% Yesterday (EL)
description.content:
Estee Lauder (NYSE:EL) traded in a range yesterday that spanned from a low of $79.29 to a high of $80.16. Yesterday, the shares gained 1.29%, which took the trading range above the 3-day high of $79.50 on volume of 908,000 shares. Often times after large one-day gains, short term traders will seek to take profits and, as such, investors should be cautious.
Shares of Estee Lauder are currently trading above their 50-day moving average (MA) of $72.39 and above their 200-day MA of $64.16. Look for the MA to provide support for a short-term pullback in the shares.
SmarTrend currently has shares of Estee Lauder in an Uptrend and issued the Uptrend alert on September 21, 2010 at $60.52. The stock has risen 30.7% since the Uptrend alert was issued.
SmarTrend expects the share price to pullback toward the $79.50 support level. Afterwards, we expect it to move upward with its peers in the SmarTrend Personal & Cleaning Products industry.
Keywords: Estee Lauder trading range stock news

description.hltext_display: Venezuela censors the net
description.author: Nick Farrell
description.content:
Venezuela's President Hugo Chavez has decided that the best way to control his flagging popularity is to censor the world wide wibble.
Under a new law, passed by the Venezuelan parliament, any internet content that "promotes social unrest, challenges authority or condones crime will be banned.
According to AFP , Chavez's ruling party pushed the law through in less than a week and it expands 2004 restrictions on content in radio, television and print media.
The new law makes webpage managers "responsible for the information and content" published on their websites."
The law is meant to crack down on media content that "makes an apology of crime," "promotes unrest in the population" or "challenges legally established authorities."
Of course a remit like that is so wide that you could land a 747 on it, sideways and so it is basically a tool to shut down any site that Chavez does not like and to put the fear of God into website owners.
Webpage managers must now "establish mechanisms to restrict, without delay, the diffusion of messages... that are included in the ban."
If they get into trouble they could lose up to "10 percent of the previous year's gross income," in addition to "72 hours of continuous suspension of services."
Last week, Venezuela's parliament gave President Chavez decree powers for 18 months, effectively turning South America's biggest oil producer into a dictatorship. After 12 years in power and with flagging support, it seems that he wants to entrench his self-styled "revolution" which has done little to help his poor, rural support base. Â We guess his supporters don't use the net much.

description.hltext_display: Instant Unsecured Personal Loans - Quick Asst Free Cash For Use
description.content: Are you looking for an alternative that would let your have risk free finance? Do you need to fulfill your personal wants with it? If yes then instant unsecured personal loans are perfect for you. In the case of this fiscal service, the borrower can get hold of quick asset free cash for use. Both renters as well as property owners can apply for this service.The process of asset check is not followed, and thus you would obtain risk free money. You would get instant unsecured personal loans without placing any of your assets such as car, house, stock papers and so on as a security against the credit that you want. The lender charges higher interest rate to lower the risk for him selfWith instant unsecured personal loans, the borrower can arrange an amount that falls in the range of Â£1000 to Â£25000 according to your settlement stability and monetary capacity. One has to repay the borrowed amount in comfortable time span of 1 to 10 years. By putting into use the borrowed credit, you can do number of things. You can settle your debts, can pay the monthly house rental, can pay the installments of the credit card, can pay the household and utility bills and so on.A no obligation and free of cost online application form would be given on the websites of the money lenders. Make use of it and apply. Fill it with your genuine personal details. As the process of verification is over, the borrower gets an approval. The approved credit would come into your bank account within the least possible duration. There is no faxing hassle here. Apart from this, all kinds of adverse credit scores such as IVA, bankruptcy, CCJs, foreclosures, insolvency, arrears and so on would not be paid much heed to.
